attributes.title: ugh awful
attributes.review: the app was super laggy and a big orange pig showed up on my screen when i first opened the app. it had some weird foreign language on the cover. something about keeping america great. who even knows what that means. anyways, it kept telling me to text something to a number and i felt super violated and pressured. this app is promoting peer pressuring. i felt like it was screaming at me through the screen to text this number. i immediately tried deleting the app, but it wouldnâ€™t let me. instead, pictures of a huge orange gorilla kept popping up. it was like a slideshow from a nightmare. but somehow i couldnâ€™t look away. it was like a car crash. itâ€™s so bad and horrific, but somehow you canâ€™t take your eyes off of it. so i just thought â€œwhy notâ€ and signed into the app. i put my info in and shortly after began getting text messages of a naked man who seemed to be getting a spray tan. i screamed in horror, which in turn made my grandmother experience a stroke. as the paramedics were attempting to put my grandmother into the ambulance who, mind you, weighs just over 500 pounds, my phone started screaming â€œTRUMP HAS A BIG VOLUPTUOUS WEINER!â€ at this point, i was so confused and decided to delete the app. however, even months after this incident my phone still receives messages from that same number. the texts tell me to â€œgive head to the person to your left if you support trumpâ€ and keep sending me god awful pictures of that same large orange animal. in conclusion, donâ€™t get this app unless you or a loved one want to experience a stroke.
